title: Welcome!
VBS is the most important annual event f: VBS is the most important annual event for our children!
Every year we design the details so that: Every year we design the details so that it is an unforgettable experience for them and remains in their memory forever.
In a fun way, they will learn biblical p: In a fun way, they will learn biblical principles so that they build a life of success in their adult life.
Our work team, from teachers, decorators: Our work team, from teachers, decorators, and kitchen staff, are people with great hearts and a spirit of service who will treat your children in a very kind and responsible manner.
Thank you for entrusting us with your mo: Thank you for entrusting us with your most valuable treasure.
Let the children come to me, for the kin: Let the children come to me, for the kingdom of heaven belongs to them. Jesus.
We want the well-being of our community. We work and reach out through various activities, all on a nonprofit basis.
We like to understand your needs and hel: We like to understand your needs and help you improve in all areas.
We are a church with open arms for you a: We are a church with open arms for you and your family, and if you do not have one, here you will feel at home.
God has so much for you.
We invite you to join our WhatsApp group: We invite you to join our WhatsApp group so we can send you notifications for each event.
